name: Solsea NFT collection templates
description:
This is a file with templates for all the marketing banners & posters you need when creating a NFT collection on Solsea.


It includes templates for:

  1. collection header
  2. collection icon
  3. vertical banner
  4. horizontal banner


I have also added sample layouts for the header and banner designs!


Check out the blog on how to design your Solsea collection images here
